I’m confident that this tax plan will put people back to work, put money back in their pockets, & make our American economy – and the people who participate in it – competitive w/ the rest of the world. #gapolpic.twitter.com/QMxDI9VyCZ

Thanks to @AFPhq, @FreedomPartners, @GenOpp, & @LIBREinitiative for joining @SenThomTillis, @SenDeanHeller, & me to talk about the importance of changing the tax code & getting it done this week. ICYMI, watch here:https://www.periscope.tv/SenateGOP/1YpKkWAWBdoKj …
It’s critical for Republicans and Democrats to put aside any self-interests and operate with a sense of urgency to get these tax changes done now.
This tax plan is an investment to ensure that our children & our children’s children continue to enjoy economic opportunity here in America.
Under this tax bill, the average single parent w/ one child, earning $41,000/year, will get a tax cut of $1,400. That’s 75 PERCENT less.
Under this tax bill, the average family of 4 earning the median family income will get a tax cut of $2,200. That’s 60 PERCENT less.
We need to change the tax code to grow the economy, make us more competitive globally, help working Americans, & ultimately start to solve our $20T debt crisis.
Holding a tax event w/ @SenThomTillis, @SenDeanHeller, @AFPhq, @FreedomPartners, @GenOpp, & @LIBREinitiative at 10:15AM. Stay tuned for a live stream link. #gapol

Special thanks to @KellyannePolls & @stevenmnuchin1 for participating in our tax event today. It's critical that we get this done this year.pic.twitter.com/DcXx1z1xOb
Think @SenJohnKennedy said it best: changing the tax code is about putting more money back in the wallets of hard-working Americans. #gapolpic.twitter.com/OU5RUpkqMm
Washington needs a sense of urgency like it’s never had before to get tax done by the end of the year.
President Trump is moving at a business pace, not a bureaucratic pace. The American people expect Congress to do the same.
.@SenJohnKennedy: Changing the tax code is about letting you keep more of your hard-earned dollars.
.@SenatorRounds: To tackle the national debt, we've got to grow the economy. That's what changing the tax code will do.
Simplifying the individual code = relief to working Americans & their families & could mean a $4-9k increase in wage & salary income.
.@SteveDaines: "This is about a wage raise through tax cuts."pic.twitter.com/CfLrPMa4BE
.@SenTedCruz is right: changing the tax code is about creating more opportunity for American workers and families.pic.twitter.com/sFtbOMdoK1
This will lead to investment, jobs, and higher wages.
As @KellyannePolls said, getting rid of the tax on repatriated earnings will help free up more than $2T in American profits locked overseas.pic.twitter.com/oEQSvBWMiR
As a former Fortune 500 CEO, I can tell you that a lower corporate tax rate, even of 20%, will directly impact American workers.
We have a historic opportunity to change our tax code – to lift up families, defend American workers, & unleash our full economic potential.

Here is the transcript from my first Senate speech: http://www.perdue.senate.gov/content/senator-david-perdue-delivers-first-senate-speech … #NewBeginning
Our Founders would remind us of that commitment and encourage us to work together to solve these sometimes overwhelming problems
Let us fight to find common ground to create a new beginning, for our country. #Newbeginning
We need to unlock our full energy potential to get this economy moving. #NewBeginning
People back home expect Washington to work. #Georgia
To have a strong defense, though, we must have a strong economy. #newbeginning
To have a strong foreign policy we must have a strong defense.
Leading from behind has failed our foreign policy.
We face a global security crisis getting worse by the day: our allies don’t trust us, our enemies don’t fear us.
When government grows, individual liberty declines.
We face 3 crises of leadership: abuse of executive power, deterioration of American foreign policy & out-of-control debt. #NewBeginning
The desk that I use was used by Saxby Chambliss, Zell Miller, Sam Nunn, Herman Talmadge and the venerable Richard B. Russell, Jr. #Georgia
We have to act boldly if we are to save this #AmericanDream and our very way of life. #newbeginning
My story is not unique. It is the American story. Only in America is this possible thanks to hard work and self-reliance.
I am a political #outsider committed to changing the direction of our country. #newbeginning
Like many Americans, I am outraged by Washington’s dysfunction. #newbeginning
